description: os: remove document duplication in error predicate functions

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

One remaining question:
Should IsNotExist returns true when it is a *directory* that does not exist?
This won't bother Posix and Plan 9, but windows has different error code for
file not exist and directory not exist.

For consistency with IsExist(), I vote for including both.
(We have to include both for IsExist, because ioutil use it.)

Should this fix be included in this CL or I should open a new one?

LGTM

do the semantic change in a separate CL. i agree with it, if only because Windows is still open to adjustment

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=425491751164 ***

os: remove document duplication in error predicate functions

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
